Text:
Watch the stream for free from any country.

Using VLC media player click on:

Media -> Open Network Stream...

paste this URL - http://jokersupdates.com/bbcafeeds.pls

Click Play.

Right click on stream window while playing and go to Playlist to select Feed 1,2,3, or 4 and the quality for that Feed.

You can bring up 4 instances of VLC media player and watch all 4 feeds at the same time.
You have to watch with VLC Media.  Other players, the audio is off by 4 seconds.

@ChiliBean2000, thanks amil for that player link, works great (low doesn't work though but am sure it will in an update :) ).

Hope this one is entertaining like the UK/US BB
